Bueno por donde empezar...

Simplemente un clasico para aquellos que estan pensando en querer un fps con una historia inteligente o buscan una serie que motiva bastante, a mi parecer este juego debe estar en la biblioteca de steam si o si...

I think the Half-Life series deserves a "game series of the millennium" award. It never gets old, no matter how many times i play it. And don't be fooled by my steam play time, I've completed it more times than i can remember. Its an absolute masterpiece and a really amazing game.
